description: Just like its namesake, this shoe takes on the bustle of our not-so-little-anymore mountain town with confidence. It turns any sidewalk into a trail. And style—the Bozeman Low Suede's got that, too, featuring a suede upper, and oiled suede heel and toe overlays. The Bloom™ Algae O FIT Insole® and Bozeman outsole work to create a dynamic duo for all-day comfort and performance.
name: Oboz Bozeman Low Suede - Mens

specs.value: Waterproof Suede Leather, Nubuck Leather, and Textile
TPU Heel Clip, Dual Density Compression Molded EVA
